item.title: Trace metal and nutrient geochemistry
item.description: The weathering of trace metals and nutrients on land, their transport into the marine realm, and partitioning in sediments.

item.title: Redox through Earth history
item.description: Redox evolution of the ocean and atmosphere in the Archean, Proterozoic, and Paleozoic, as well as its effects on the biosphere and global elemental cycles.

item.title: Phosphogenesis
item.description: The generation of phosphate-rich minerals and sediments. The preservation of microbes in apatite and their role in its nucleation and growth.

item.title: Weathering environments
item.description: Weathering environments as sources of nutrients to the biosphere and archives of Earth’s atmospheric composition.

item.title: Amber geochemistry
item.description: The provenance of amber deposits as revealed through their stable isotope composition and spectral characteristics.
